revised_title: A Case Study of Dropsy of the Ovarium and its Treatment
tldr: This article presents a case study of a woman with dropsy of the ovarium, a condition where fluid accumulates in the abdomen. The patient underwent numerous treatments to remove the fluid, which was eventually traced back to the ovarium. The case study discusses the patient's medical history, the treatments she received, and the eventual dissection of her body after her death. The author reflects on the limitations of current medical knowledge and the role of nature in providing relief from such conditions.
